channel.title: Runescape stopping possible?
channel.description:
There are many, many servers and these are all being rented and all the people working for jagex must cost money, am I right??? Well if im not please tell me and tell me how. What if they have a bad month or get sued.... there has got to be a possibility that they can go broke. What are your views on runescape, not deciding to willfully stop running servers but going broke. This could mean that all of our hard work, scripters and players alike would all become useless. Scripts useless and players loose accounts and details.
Me personally I would have lost well over years of work........I think there is only one thing i would do, I would find zezima and laugh in his face. Think of what a person like that would loose over a skill wipe!

item.title: Runescape stopping possible?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“wonderguy6, post:14, topic:62928”]Imagen WoW Freaks!

man the ppls who created WOW must be WOW rich.[/quote]

The actual creator’s only get about 6% of the profit. The rest goes to the publisher. Either way, they are all stinkin’ rich.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape stopping possible?
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

[quote=“Sleep, post:7, topic:62928”]Jagex makes roughly 42.5 Million dollars a month from Membership alone. Imagine the cost of companies putting their Adds on F2P servers they probably make over 50 Million a month. So I don’t see them going broke in the near future.[/quote]And what formula did you use to calculate 42.5 million dollars a month? Do you understand how much money that is?

Read full topic
